overview:
Kadir Rathnavelu is leading the development of a v1 product for RealNetworks, Inc., Seattle. In addition to planning and development of the product, he is responsible for UI / UX for clients running on multiple platforms.

Prior to this role, Kadir was responsible for development of all mobile clients for a cloud-based media management product called Unifi. He was also responsible for development and release of RealDownloader and RealViewer.

Before RealNetworks, Kadir helped various business develop new mobile and web products and help create new revenue lines.

In Australia, Kadir ran a startup focusing on developing a synchronization framework for mobile devices. He managed and lead a team developing innovative mobile and automated billing systems for Toll Logistics, Australia. He was responsible for building and rolling out of mobile solutions across various businesses.

Kadir graduated from Monash University in 2004 with a Masters in Digital Communications.
